name: Climbing Champs
description:
Have you ever felt the need for climb? Well, it's not about the lame outdoor; it's about the interior of the volcano!

Download the special, multi-player edition of Flick Champions Extreme Sport and meet the volcanoists from around the world, challenge them, or master your way up alone to meet them again once you've reached the top.

On your journey from the center of the earth, taste the smell of sulfur and feel the breath of your opponents on your sweat-soaked back.

Take a deep sigh, jump off, hit the ax, jump again, and don't get burnt within the bubbling lava. Follow the rock slits to maximize your score-combos. Collect power-ups and achieve burnout performance to outdistance your rival!

In this highly addicitve, flick-based arcade runner, the wall is lava. Don't stop at the top, or it will pour into your pants!


FEATURES:
► Real-time multiplayer arcade cross-platform... climbing!
► Solo, rank-boosting mode
► Instant pick-up and play with extremely slick controls
► Vibrant, modern, High-Definition graphics
► Global Ranking of the best (and worst! :) Volcanoists
► Smooth, lightweight and User-friendly


Stay tuned for more online multiplayer sporting events, powered by Flick Champions ™!
